posts.message:
A question for c# experts
I have always used static constructors to initiate class variables from configuration files, today I had to initialize some variable using a static constructor from an oracle database, it occurred to me that it might be a problem if the database is not available when these fields are initialized, since this program will be mostly unsupervised I need to make sure it will manage to initialize it's fields whenever the database becomes available, since static constructors only run once at an undetermined time, this doesn't happen, any ideas?

posts.message:
سلاموا عليكم :D
انا شغال فى مجال الجيمز انا لسه طالب واكيد يعنى مش معايه فلوس عشان اعمل موظفين وشركه وكده 
انا محتاج ديزاينر معايه 
يكون شغال فوتوشوب ده شىء اساسى 
ويريت يكون شغال فى 3d max او maya او blender 
وانا مش بدور على موظف انا بدور على حد يشتغل معايه 
ويريت يكون طالب برضوا عشان انا كل اللى قابلتهم عايزين فلوس :D

posts.message:
An unfortunate event happened to my girlfriend this week, they scammed her for DKK 400. Upon inspection, it turns out it was a dark pattern.

The service offered a 14 days trial for £1. No where on their website do they mention a monthly subscription fee and for how much. No where on their website do they link to a pricing page.

But get this, it's actually mentioned in their terms of service...  http://jukebux.com/terms.php?lang=uk clause 4

It's a rare occasion for an average joe computer user to read the terms of service and those who do, rarely understand it.

So they get your credit card on system, charge you £1. You agreed to the terms of service likely without reading it, TOS mention a EUR/GBP 50 charge upon the trial ending and next thing, you're wondering what happened to your money.

Anyway, that's that. Jukebux, a dark patterns embracer. There's a much more deeper plot behind what actually happened, how they scammed her into getting an account (She didn't knowingly know she was signing up for a Jukebux account) I'm still investigating how this happened.

Lesson:
**Read The Terms Of Service**
posts.caption: darkpatterns.org
posts.description: Dark Patterns: fighting user deception worldwideA Dark Pattern is a type of user interface that appears to have been carefully crafted to trick users into doing things, such as buying insurance with their purchase or signing up for recurring bills.Normally when you think of “bad design”, you think o...

أنا نزلت بايثون وكله تمام ,, وأشتغلت إمبارح بالNotepad و cmd عشان أشوف النتائج 
تمام !! 
لما كنت بحفظ الملف اللي انا كتبت فيه الكود كان بياخد شكل النوت باد وعليه بايثون وبيشتغل معايا تمام
دلوقتي مش بياخد شكل بايثون خالص علي نوت باد ,, ومش بيشتغل علي cmd خالص .. 
إيه الحل !!
